jp.go.aist.six.oval.core.interpreter

Class NetworkingOvaldiProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.go.aist.six.oval.core.interpreter.OvaldiProxy
      • jp.go.aist.six.oval.core.interpreter.NetworkingOvaldiProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OvalInterpreter

    public class NetworkingOvaldiProxy
extends OvaldiProxy
    An ovaldi wrapper that enables network transfer of OVAL data.
    • -o filename|URL: path to the oval definitions XML file
    • -r filename|URL: save oval-results to the specified XML file
    Version:
    $Id: NetworkingOvaldiProxy.java 3083 2013-03-14 07:24:56Z nakamura5akihito@gmail.com $
    Author:
    Akihito Nakamura, AIST
    See Also:
    OVAL Interpreter
